name: Doctor Orderly MD PHD DDS
descriptions: Doctor Orderly MD PHD DDS is a unique Mister Orderly found at Big MT in 2281.

Doctor Orderly MD PHD DDS is a stronger version of the Mister Orderly robots found in the Y-17 medical facility. It also apparently has three different post-graduate academic degrees: Doctor of Medicine (MD), Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) and Doctor of Dental Surgery (DDS).
Doctor Orderly MD PHD DDS appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.
